manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Let’s be honest, at a certain age you’d rather have another breakup than another breakout. We feel like acne as an adult shouldn’t happen, but it does. Over 50 million Americans suffer from it annually. So...you’re not alone. But before you head into that board meeting sporting your three-piece suit and your latest breakout — it might be time to give Differin a try. Differin Daily Refreshing Cleanser Leaves skin feeling fresh and clean There are a lot of cleansers out there that promise everything from boosting your mood to younger looking skin. But if you're looking for a refreshing cleanser that'll lift away surface oil without leaving your skin feeling tight or dry...you've found it. Differin Daily Refreshing Cleanser lathers into a light foam and draws in moisture while cleansing away dirt. Looking to cleanse away the memory of the super embarrassing thing you did last weekend? Unfortunately, you're on your own.

How to use as a part of your acne fighting routine: Kick off your acne-fighting routine with a small amount Differin Daily Refreshing Cleanser, to wash away surface oil and dirt without overly drying skin. Then apply a thin layer of Differin Gel once every day all over your face — even when you’re not breaking out. Differin Gel might take a few weeks to start to work, and during this time, you could experience some dryness and irritation while your skin gets ready for gorgeous. Keep skin protected all day with a hydrating SPF lotion like Differin Oil Absorbing Moisturizer, and deeply moisturized all night with a nourishing lotion like Differin Restorative Night Moisturizer.

Why to use: Get fresh without stripping For skin that's so fresh and so clean. Formulated to gently cleanse away surface oil and dirt without leaving skin feeling tight or overly dry. We won’t strip your skin’s natural moisture away, because honestly who wants that? No one. Duh. Ingredients you’ll love Differin Daily Refreshing Cleanser is made with Panthenol to help nourish skin, and contains Glycerin to draw moisture to skin to help leave it soft and smooth, you know…cool science stuff. Unbothered You know how some cleansers irritate your skin and leave it feeling gross? Yeah, this won’t do that. It’s non-irritating, fragrance-free, and non-comedogenic. Those are all a lot of big words, but all-in-all it just means it’s great for sensitive skin.

Differin Daily Refreshing Cleanser Differin Daily Deep Cleanser Differin Gentle Cleanser Differin Gel (45g) Differin Restorative Night Moisturizer Differin Dark Spot Correcting Serum Try Other Differin Products Low-lather formula removes surface oil and dirt without leaving skin feeling tight or overly dry. Dual-action formula containing benzoyl peroxide penetrates deep into pores and absorbs excess oil while releasing a gentle moisturizer that won't clog pores. Gently removes makeup and other impurities, even on sensitive skin. Clears and prevents pimples, blackheads, whiteheads and clogged pores to restore skin tone and texture. Up to a 90-day supply. Reduces appearance of redness from dryness and visibly improves skin texture by rehydrating skin overnight. Helps lighten post-acne marks, hyperpigmentation, and blotches to improve overall skin tone and clarity. Category Cleanse Other Cleanser Cleanse Treat Moisturize Correct Size 6 oz 4 oz 4 oz 45g 90-day supply 2.5 oz 1 oz Added benefit Perfectly primes skin for Differin Gel Contains Benzoyl Peroxide Great for sensitive skin Contains the retinoid Adapalene Contains ceramides and hyaluronic acid Contains hydroquinone 2% to fade dark spots Usage Daily AM and PM Daily AM and PM Daily AM and PM Once Daily, AM or PM Daily PM Once Daily, AM or PM

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well too
reviews.reviewText: Works well make your face feel good didn't have a lot of suds through

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love all the products by Differin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I'm a personal trainer who needs a deep cleaning face wash to keep my face clear of breakouts & bright. This wash is perfect for both. It could be harsh for sensitive skin, I'd recommend using it a few times a week. I have oily skin, which helps when I'm needing to unclog pores.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you stick with it results are good
reviews.reviewText: My daughter started getting bad acne when she went to college she was a student athlete. We tried EVERYTHING she is allergic to benzoyl peroxide. We tried tea tree oil.,essential ouls all sorts of lotions and potions, acupuncture, masks, facials you name it…when I say we tried everything. It was affecting my daughters self confidence, she didn’t want to go out in public. A much younger coworker (newly college grad) said she suffered same thing in college and suggested differin gel, it use to be by prescription only but had recently became OTC. This stuff works. She couldn’t use the spot treatments to see immediate results bc they contain benzoyl peroxide. She used the face wash. It works from inside out so it does take time. It will get worse before better. Again it’s changing your skin from inside out. I PROMISE it will start working my daughter skin is clear now. Anyone struggling with acne please try this. I cannot say it enough STICK WITH IT, even when you see more pimples or your skin dries out DO NOT get discouraged because that means it working stick with it I PROMISE it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a no scrub face wash
reviews.reviewText: Love this face wash. When you don’t need a scrub this is great. The smell is not so great but I don’t want smells on my face anyway. It’s not a thick soap it’s thin so you don’t need to use a lot. The bottle will last you long. I use it every other day. My face is super oily and it makes my face feel nice and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy, effective and affordable!
reviews.reviewText: Highly recommended by my Dermatologist! Gentle enough to use daily, really prevents acne but does not dry out the skin. Great in combination with Differing daily moisturizer and Differin gel. Lasts a long time even with daily use! I’m a no fuss kinda gal, don’t get into expensive or complicated skin regimens. But can’t recommend the 3-part Differin skin system highly enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars does what it needs to do
reviews.reviewText: It does cleanse but it is very stripping and the fragrance is gross. I must use a moisturizer after. Not for dry skin. If it was fragrance free it would be great for oily/combo skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
reviews.reviewText: So, maybe it's just me because Im well-lifted from blowing some great CBD or my senses are failing me.I washed my face with this cleanser and it felt great the ingredients are clean, it did soothe my skin and smelled familiar. Overall, it's an well-rounded cleanser BUT.......it smells like "Cetaphil", looks like "Cetaphil" and feels just like "Cetaphil". Hold up wait, there's more!....... It even has the SAME ingredients as the "Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser"!!!!!!!Given that both products are manufactured from the same laboratory (Galderma). People are probably paying twice for the same product/ingredients and unaware of these shenanigan's. BUT.....atleast it's sold at half the price of "Cetaphil", for that......I have no complaints. I'll keep buying it! Lol!

Es muy buen limpiador, es gentil con la piel, no reseca y además quita el maquillaje por completo. Tiene una consistencia algo líquida pero no crea tanta espuma. La fragancia es sutil y no irrita los ojos. En 3 días he notado que mi piel está más limpia y menos irritada.

I've tried a bunch of product. Neutrogena. Clean and clear. Plenty. But this one keeps my skin clear the longest. Haven't got a zit so far. Also I did tweak my diet a little and also I use aloe Vera at night before sleep now. Does wonders. I might try the dark spot next. :)
